about_the_game:
WHAT IS CUTE AS HELL?

Cute as HELL is a collection of cute minigames that will challenge even the best players out there!

WASN'T IT A PARTY GAME?

We were trying to create a party game called "Cheery Party" but we decided to expand on one of its modes called "Challenge Mode" to create a full solo game: Cute as HELL!

HOW MANY MINIGAMES WILL THERE BE?

The Early Access will launch with 20 engaging and polished minigames. Then we will add minigames on a monthly basis until it gets to 100!
detailed_description:
WHAT IS CUTE AS HELL?

Cute as HELL is a collection of cute minigames that will challenge even the best players out there!

WASN'T IT A PARTY GAME?

We were trying to create a party game called "Cheery Party" but we decided to expand on one of its modes called "Challenge Mode" to create a full solo game: Cute as HELL!

HOW MANY MINIGAMES WILL THERE BE?

The Early Access will launch with 20 engaging and polished minigames. Then we will add minigames on a monthly basis until it gets to 100!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 / AMD PRO A12-8870
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500 / Radeon HD 7520G / GeForce GT 720
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 290X / GeForce GTX 970 or above
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8257U
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

name: Cute as HELL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 / AMD PRO A12-8870
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5500 / Radeon HD 7520G / GeForce GT 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 290X / GeForce GTX 970 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Cute as HELL is a cute and crazily HARD minigame collection!
